Caluren 2 is a sequel to the horror game Caluren, though I aimed this game to be more of a dark puzzle game. This game is VERY different from all the other games out there; it is a completely new idea. Caluren 2 quite literally takes you through a maze of files and folders that have been corrupted by something. The journey starts getting darker and more twisted as you descend deeper into the files.
